body.description: The OpenAPI specification that defines the structure and behavior of the API.

fail_on_warnings.description: A boolean flag to determine whether to fail the creation of the API if there are warnings present.

name.description: The name of the REST API.

parameters.description: A map of additional parameters to pass to the API Gateway.

put_rest_api_mode.description: The mode of updating the REST API, such as 'merge' or 'overwrite'.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the API for categorization and identification purposes.
